Name: Breath
About the game: Breath is not an easy game, but it is not a long game too. Start as a simple life-form and evolve your way by defeating the bosses in any order you wish. One ability gained from one boss can help you to defeat another one. Can you beat the game without deaths? How fast can you beat it? Try yourself in ' 1 Life Mode ' and ' SpeedRun Mode '! Compete against your own time or set a custom time to try to be the fastest in the world! Play multiple times trying different routes and, as you play, unlock new abilities to start the game with, adding layers of complexity. Don't forget to try to find all the hidden spider webs. If you ever feel lost on how to play, pause the game (esc or start) and a button map will show up. Life is but a Breath!
